model.terrains

Class Terrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.terrains.Terrain

  • public class Terrain
extends java.lang.Object
    A Terrain is an area of a location. A terrain depends on a blend map and height map to know how to style the terrain. The terrain is made up of a texture pack
    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(int gridX,
       int gridZ,
       TerrainTexturePack texture,
       TerrainTexture blendMap,
       java.lang.String heightMap,
       java.lang.String NAME,
       java.lang.String DESCRIPTION)
        Constructor

        Creates a new terrain at the given gridX/gridZ grid

        Parameters:
        gridX - gridX position
        gridZ - gridZ position
        texture - texture pack to make up the terrain
        blendMap - blend map for mixing textures
        heightMap - height map to style terrain y values

        gridZ - gridZ position

        blendMap - blend map for mixing textures
        heightMap - height map to style terrain y values
        size - the size
